page.title: 13A modern school day
page.content: I woke up at 7 o'clock and stayed in bed until 7.30, then I dressed & had a wash. I then had some Shreddies. At 8.30 I left for school & arrived at 8.45. When the bell went we went in for assembly. When assembly finished we had our first lesson and then a break. Then we went in again & had another lesson. At 12.15 I had lunch and did laying up. After lunch we had Geography and afterwards it was break again. After break we had Science which was boring. Then it was time to go home. Mum picked me up in the car-park and we drove home. When we got home I went next door and watched children's programmes. When tea was ready I went home. After tea I went and messed about in my room. Then I went downstairs and watched "The Young Ones" before I went to bed.
